com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Class ShiftReduceTransitionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.ShiftReduceTransitionSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransitionSystem

    public class ShiftReduceTransitionSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The arc-standard Shift-Reduce transition system, as described in Nivre 2009 Dependency Parsing, Chapter 3, augmented with an explicit Reduce transition to allow for corpora with unattached nodes: artificially attaching these nodes to the root node could induce non-projectivity.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      • predictTransitions

        public void predictTransitions(ParseConfiguration configuration,
                               java.util.Set<DependencyArc> targetDependencies)
                        throws UnknownDependencyLabelException,
                               CircularDependencyException
        Description copied from interface: TransitionSystem
        Predict the transitions required to generate the set of targe dependencies for a given initial configuration, also transforms the configuration so that it becomes a terminal configuration.
        Throws:
        UnknownDependencyLabelException - if an unknown dependency label is encountered
        CircularDependencyException - if parse tree contains a circular dependency

        Get the transition corresponding to a particular code.
        Throws:
        UnknownDependencyLabelException - if the code includes an unknown dependency label
        UnknownTransitionException - if the code includes an unknown transition
